markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 1.1 **Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270) **Prerequisites** [Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446) **Requirements** You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). --- You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) a creature you have [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), with the following additional effects if you succeed. **Critical Success** The target is [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) 2 until the end of its next turn and then is clumsy 1 for 1 minute.
**Success** The target is clumsy 1 until the end of its next turn.
name: Spinebreaker
requirement: You have a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446)

**Requirements**
You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90).

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points.
</summary>
summary: You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points.
summary_markdown: You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Spinebreaker Single Action Source Player Core 2 pg. 223 1.1 Archetype Wrestler Prerequisites Wrestler Dedication Requirements You have a creature grabbed or restrained. --- You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points. Attempt an Athletics check to Grapple a creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following additional effects if you succeed. Critical Success The target is clumsy 2 until the end of its next turn and then is clumsy 1 for 1 minute. Success The target is clumsy 1 until the end of its next turn.
